description: Earendel, the farthest object ever seen, was first thought to be a single massive star from the early universe. New findings from JWST suggest it may instead be a star cluster, with many stars grouped together. Scientists used gravitational lensing to spot Earendel, which made its light appear thousands of times brighter.
title: Earendel: JWST Suggests the Most Distant Star May Be a Star Cluster

description: F1-The Movie is a sports drama movie that follows a retired F1 racer named Hayes (played by Brad Pitt), who is set to make a comeback by training a struggling team to win the World Championship. The movie explores themes of self-discovery, second chances, and redemption.
title: F1: The Movie Now Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video

description: Maareesan is an emotional and a comedy thriller Tamil movie that stars Fahadh Faasil and Vadivelu in the lead roles. The movie follows a thief and an Alzheimer’s patient who embark on a journey to Tiruenveli, and the unexpected twists and turns begin. Streaming soon on Netflix
title: Maareesan OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch It Online

description: A new mathematical approach has revived previously ignored particles, now called neglectons, and shown how they can work with Ising anyons. By filling in the missing functions of these quasiparticles, neglectons could overcome key limits in topological quantum computing and help build more stable, universal quantum computers in the future.
title: Mathematicians Revive Discarded Particles to Boost Quantum Computing

description: Pharma on JioHotstar is set to show the struggle of a middle-class boy, in his twenties, entering the pharmaceutical industry and is given some targets to meet. The web series highlights the struggle of this medical professional, while meeting industry targets and his own ethical norms challenges. The series will soon be released on JioHotstar.
title: Pharma OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: flatband states in CsCr₃Sb₅, a kagome superconductor. This experimental validation connects lattice geometry with emergent superconductivity, opening new pathways for engineered quantum materials, superconductors, and advanced electronics.
title: Rice University Scientists Confirm Flatband Discovery in Kagome Superconductor

description: The Lava Probuds Aria 911 TWS earphones and Probuds Wave 921 neckband have been launched in India. They come with a dual-tone design. They support Bluetooth 5.3 and feature 10mm drivers. They offer ENC to enhance call clarity by filtering out unwanted background noise captured by microphones
title: Lava Probuds Aria 911 and Probuds Wave 921 Earphones With ENC, 10mm Drivers Debut in India

description: Meta has reportedly frozen hiring in its newly created artificial intelligence (AI) division. As per the report, the Menlo Park-based tech giant is no longer pursuing AI researchers and engineers from rival companies or looking to reverse-acquihire staff from smaller startups working with the technology anymore. While the reason behind the move was not disclosed, the report coincides with claims of the company restructuring the Superintelligence Labs by dividing it into four specialised groups.
title: Meta Reportedly Freezes Hiring in AI Division Amid Restructuring of Superintelligence Labs

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ and Redmi Note 15 Pro are now available for purchase in China. They feature a 7,000mAh battery and carry an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance. The Redmi Note 15 Pro+ is powered by a Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC, while the Redmi Note 15 Pro runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra SoC.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ With Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 Chip Launched Alongside Redmi Note 15 Pro

description: Apple Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2 dropped the ability to measure a wearer’s blood oxygen levels in the US due to a 2024 ruling. The restriction was imposed on the Cupertino company after a lawsuit was filed by a medical instrument manufacturer. Recently, the tech giant announced that it has brought the feature back for its Watch Series 10, Series 9, and Ultra 2. This pushed Masimo to file a lawsuit again, but this time against the US Customs and Border Protection.
title: Masimo Sues US Customs After Apple Watch Models Restore Blood Oxygen Tracking Feature

description: Bitcoin rebounded to $114,600 on Thursday, after falling below $113,000 earlier in the week. Ether surged above $4,300, gaining 3.8 percent in 24 hours. Analysts linked the recovery to hawkish Federal Reserve minutes, inflation risks, and ETF outflows. Market watchers now look ahead to US unemployment and PMI data due later today and Powell’s Jackson Hole speech for signals on rate cuts, with Bitcoin resistance levels at $116,700 and $118,200 in focus.
title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $114,000 as Ether surges; Market Awaits Powell’s Speech

description: Google announced a new update for Gemini Live on Wednesday, adding new capabilities, broader app integration, and improved voice models for more natural speech. The Mountain View-based tech giant is also introducing visual guidance, allowing Gemini Live to highlight specific objects on the screen in response to user queries.
title: Google Upgrades Gemini Live With Visual Guidance, Adds Support for Phone and Messages Apps

description: iPhone 17 series could be unveiled next month. The lineup is said to contain four smartphones - the standard iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone 17 Air. The leaks regarding the specifications and features of the upcoming phones have been surfacing online for a while. However, ahead of its much-anticipated debut, a new case for the iPhone 17 lineup has appeared, which might come in five colour options.
title: iPhone 17 TechWoven Case With MagSafe Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: The Online Gaming bill, piloted by Minister of Electronics and IT Ashwini Vaishnaw, was approved by the Upper House after rejecting amendments moved by Opposition members. The bill was passed by the Lok Sabha on Wednesday.
title: Parliament Passes Online Gaming Bill to Ban All Forms of Real Money Games

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra is expected to launch soon. Ahead of its launch, the renders of the rumoured Samsung tablet have appeared online again, suggesting that it might ship S Pen support. It appears with a dual rear camera setup, along with an LED flash. Recently, the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra also appeared on the IECEE certification website.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra Design Spotted in Leaked Renders; Could Feature 14.6-inch OLED Display

description: The Rogue Prince of Persia is now available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X, Ubisoft and partner developer Evil Empire announced at Xbox's Gamescom broadcast on Wednesay. The game's 1.0 version arrives after it spent over a year in early access on Steam.
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia Gets Surprise Launch on PC, Consoles; Available on Game Pass, PS Plus Game Catalog

description: Vivo has launched its much-awaited Vivo Vision Explorer Edition Mixed Reality (MR) headset in China on Thursday. The first MR headset from the Chinese tech brand arrives as an Apple Vision Pro rival. It features a dual 8K HD resolution display and is powered by the Snapdragon XR2+ Gen 2 chipset.
title: Vivo Vision Mixed Reality Headset With 8K Micro-OLED Displays Launched as Apple Vision Pro Competitor

description: Realme has teased the launch of a new smartphone that will launch next week, hinting at a massive “1x000mAh” battery, likely at least 10,000mAh, which would be the largest yet in a smartphone. Another teaser references both 320W fast charging and a huge battery, suggesting upgraded features. However, details, including the device’s name, remain unconfirmed. More information is expected closer to launch. Notably, in May, Realme showcased a GT concept phone equipped with a 10,000mAh battery and 320W fast charging support.
title: Realme Smartphone With 10,000mAh+ Battery to Be Unveiled on August 27

description: Qualcomm is all set to host its annual Snapdragon Summit 2025 next month, where it is expected to showcase the successor to the current flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. However, one more flagship-level processor could also be introduced. As per a tipster, a purported Qualcomm SoC, dubbed Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, is also in development. It is said to share its architecture with the proprietary Oryon CPU that was introduced with the Snapdragon 8 Elite at the Snapdragon Summit last year.
title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC to Feature Similar Architecture as Flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite 2, Tipster Claims

description: Google unveiled several new products at its Made by Google event in New York on Wednesday. While the Pixel 10 series was the main highlight of the event, several other announcements also took place. Among them is a new health coach for the Pixel Watch, Fitbit trackers, and Fitbit smartwatches, powered by artificial intelligence (AI). As per the company, it can create custom routines, tailor workouts based on data, and provide sleep quality insights.
title: Google Announces Gemini-Powered Health Coach With Personalised Insights for Pixel Watch, Fitbit Trackers

description: The Google Photos app is getting new artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities that enable automatic image edits based on natural language commands from the user. Announced at the Made by Google event on Wednesday, it is rolling out beginning with the newly introduced Google Pixel 10 in the US. The tech giant is also implementing industry-standard C2PA Content Credentials within the native Camera app on Pixel to differentiate between images edited with and without AI.
title: Google Photos App Will Now Let You Make Image Edits With Voice Commands, Starting With Pixel 10 Series

description: Google Pixel 10 series has been launched globally, including in India. The latest lineup, with the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold, was unveiled during the California-based tech giant’s Made By Google event on Wednesday (August 20). Apart from the phones, the company has also launched its new smartwatch, the Pixel Watch 4. The flagship Google Pixel 10 Pro XL has a slightly smaller display than its direct competitors, the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and iPhone 16 Pro Max.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL vs Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra vs Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max

description: Microsoft has started testing the semantic file search feature in Windows 11 with a larger user base. On Wednesday, the Redmond-based tech giant announced that two new artificial intelligence (AI) features are now available to all Insiders using Copilot+ PCs. The feature, powered by Copilot, allows users to search for certain files and images using natural language queries.
title: Microsoft Begins Testing Semantic File Search in Copilot+ PCs, Introduces New Copilot Home Experience

description: Snapdragon W5+ Gen 2 and Snapdragon W5 Gen 2 chips were launched by Qualcomm on Wednesday. The new chipsets designed for smartwatches come with satellite support, allowing users to send and receive messages via satellite when outside of cellular and Wi-Fi coverage areas. It is leveraging Skylo’s Narrowband Non-Terrestrial Network (NB-NTN).
title: Snapdragon W5+ Gen 2, W5 Gen 2 Smartwatch Chips With Satellite Connectivity Unveiled; to Debut on Pixel Watch 4

description: Sony has announced a price hike for its PlayStation 5 consoles in the US for the first time since the Trump administration imposed widespread tariffs on imports in April. Prices of the PS5, PS5 digital edition, and the PS5 Pro are going up by $50.
title: Sony Hikes PS5, PS5 Pro Prices in US, Citing 'Challenging Economic Environment'

description: At the recent Made by Google 2025 event, Google quietly teased a new Nest smart speaker during a promotional video featuring F1 driver Lando Norris and NBA star Giannis Antetokounmpo. In the video, Norris interacts with an unfamiliar device using Gemini Live mode, suggesting it could be a forthcoming Nest speaker.
title: Google's Pixel 10 Launch Event May Have Quietly Revealed a New Nest Smart Speaker

description: Halo X, a new artificial intelligence (AI) smart glasses with a display, was unveiled by the newly formed startup Halo on Wednesday. The company is pitching its glasses as a device that gives users “superhuman intelligence.” The core idea is that the smart glasses, equipped with a microphone, continuously record their surrounding.
title: Halo X Smart Glasses Unveiled, Can Continuously Record Audio and Use AI to Answer Queries

description: The Google Pixel 10 features a 6.3-inch OLED Super Actua display with Gorilla Glass Victus 2 protection. Powered by the Tensor G5 SoC with 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, and Android 16, it offers a 48-megapixel triple rear camera setup, including 5x telephoto zoom support, a 4,970mAh battery with 30W fast charging, and 15W Qi2 wireless charging. Here, we compare the phone, including its price and specifications, against other flagship models from competing OEMs, like the OnePlus 13 and the Samsung Galaxy S25.
title: Pixel 10 vs OnePlus 13 vs Samsung Galaxy S25: Best Premium Smartphones Under Rs 1 Lakh Compared

description: Google introduced a feature called Daily Hub with the Pixel 10 series. On the Pixel 10 series, Daily Hub provides a quick-look feed featuring your upcoming calendar events, current weather, suggested YouTube videos and playlists, and topics tailored to your interests based on your Google activity.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series' Daily Hub Brings Personalised Digest, Rivalling Samsung’s Now Brief

description: Google’s Pixel Buds Pro 2 will soon gain Adaptive Audio, which automatically adjusts ANC to the environment while maintaining awareness with minimal distraction. A new Loud Noise Protection feature will dampen sudden sounds like sirens to protect hearing. Users will be able to answer calls or reply to texts hands-free using head gestures. Additionally, the earbuds will support hands-free Gemini access, using advanced audio filtering to prioritise the user’s voice for seamless AI interactions, even in noisy settings. All new features will roll out in September, the company confirmed.
title: Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 Update to Bring Adaptive Audio, Loud Noise Protection and More Features

description: Microsoft announced the release date for its Xbox-branded ROG Ally handhelds at Gamescom on Wednesday. The ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X will launch on October 16. Microsoft and Asus, however, said they would reveal the pricing at a later date.
title: Microsoft Announces ROG Xbox Ally, Xbox Ally X Launch Date, Stays Mum on Pricing

description: Apple has announced its first retail store in Bengaluru. The opening of the Apple Hebbal, its newest retail store in India, in September coincides with the launch of the iPhone 17 series, which is just a few days away—the Apple Hebbal Store opens on Tuesday, September 2 at 1 PM IST.
title: Apple’s First Retail Store in Bengaluru Opens September 2

description: The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold carries several upgrades over the preceding model. With a commanding price tag, the Pixel 10 Pro Fold once again falls into the vicinity of other flagship foldables, namely the latest Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Vivo X Fold 5. Here is a detailed comparison of the three flagship handsets.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 vs Vivo X Fold 5

description: Google Pixel 10 series was launched on Wednesday with much fanfare. Just like typical Made by Google events, the showcase focused equal parts on the hardware, software, and ecosystem features. One interesting software upgrade to the smartphone series is coming in the form of Gboard, which is now getting its first set of artificial intelligence (AI) features.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Gets Upgraded Gboard With Voice-Activated AI Writing Tools

description: Apple on Wednesday rolled out the iOS 18.6.2 update for iPhone. It arrives almost a week after the release of the iOS 18.6.1 update, which added back blood oxygen monitoring to the Apple Watch for users in the US. As per the Cupertino-based tech giant, the latest firmware brings a fix for a security issue discovered in previous iterations. The update has been released for iPhone XS and later models.
title: Apple Releases iOS 18.6.2 Update for iPhone With ‘Important’ Fix for Zero-Day Vulnerability

description: Google Pixel 10 series was launched on Wednesday at the Made by Google event. The flagship smartphones from the company also attract a flagship price. However, if you live in the US, there might be a workaround. Popular network carrier AT&T is currently running a promotional event where it is offering the Google Pixel 10 Pro and Pixel 10 Pro XL effectively for free when buyers exchange any older Pixel device in any condition.
title: How to Get a Free Google Pixel 10 Pro or 10 Pro XL From AT&T in the US

description: The Google Pixel 10 series is finally here and has many interesting features and specifications. The devices come with a new design language and offer an IP68 rating, making them dust and water-resistant. The phones also feature the latest Google Tensor G5 chipset and pack a ton of AI features. In this article, we will be talking about five things that we liked about the new Google Pixel series and one thing that we didn’t.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Launched: 5 Things We Liked and 1 We Didn’t

description: Gemini is among the top artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots available to a global user base with its wide range of multimodal and reasoning-based capabilities. If you plan to use it, you should know what features are available to those at the free tier and which would require a paid subscription.
title: Gemini Free vs Paid: What Features Are Free and What You Will Need to Pay For

description: Google launched its highly anticipated Pixel 10 series on Wednesday at an event hosted by Jimmy Fallon in New York. A total of four models have been launched — Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Interestingly, every new Pixel model except the base Pixel 10 comes with a complimentary bundled subscription to Google’s AI Pro plan. It grants Pixel users enhanced access to the Mountain View-based tech giant’s AI capabilities and tools.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, Pixel 10 Pro Fold Purchases Include Free Google AI Pro Subscription
